Rescue Textarea - Never Lose Your Work Again!

Have you ever accidentally closed a tab and lost everything you were typing?
Rescue Textarea is here to save the day! This lightweight yet powerful extension automatically saves your input from textareas as you type, ensuring that no important text is lost – even if you mistakenly close or refresh the tab.

Key Features:
 - Auto-Save as You Type: Every character you type is saved instantly without needing to press any buttons.
 - One-Click Restore: Quickly recover lost input by reopening the page – your text will be right where you left it.
 - Easy Copy & Manage History: Access saved inputs from the extension popup. With a simple click, copy your text or delete entries you no longer need.
 - Sleek and Minimalistic: Works in the background without disrupting your workflow. No unnecessary settings – just install and let it do its job.
Why You Need Rescue Textarea:
 - Prevents Accidental Data Loss: Ideal for long forms, blog posts, or online chat tools.
 - Saves Time and Effort: No need to rewrite lost content – spend more time being productive.
 - Peace of Mind: Focus on your writing without worrying about losing progress.
Install Rescue Textarea today and ensure your hard work is never lost to accidental tab closures!
